org.jpasecurity.security

Class EntityFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpasecurity.security.EntityFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccessManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CriteriaEntityFilter

    public class EntityFilter
extends Object
implements AccessManager
    This class handles the access control. It filters JPQL queries and can evaluate for a specific entity whether it is accessible or not.
    Author:
    Arne Limburg, Stefan Hildebrandt
